name: Hadi Ahmadi
about: Hadi Ahmadi is a professional writer with more than 30 years of writing experience. He mostly writes books about programming and computer science

name: Edriss Alokozay
about: Edriss Alokozay is very professional developer but don't have experience in writing technical books, 30 years ago He wrote a book about HTML language which was not successful, then he started writing poems.
